appsgate.lig.upnp.adapter
Class ProxyDiscovery

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.upnp.adapter.ProxyDiscovery

public class ProxyDiscovery
extends java.lang.Object

This class listen for UPnPDevice service discovery events and creates the APAM proxy for all hosted services in the device. Proxies are looked up using Apam resolver capabilities, so they may be deployed as a side effect of a discovery.

Author:
vega

Nested Class Summary
private  class ProxyDiscovery.DeviceDiscoveryRequest
          The handler of the discovery request, It look for a proxy for each service and create the appropriate instance.
private  class ProxyDiscovery.DeviceLostRequest
          The handler of the unbound request, It dispose all the created proxies associated to the device.

context

The bundle context of the discovery

executor

private static final java.util.concurrent.Executor executor
The event executor. We use a pool of a threads to notify APAM of underlying platform events, without blocking the platform thread.

boundDevice

private void boundDevice(org.osgi.service.upnp.UPnPDevice device)
Method invoked with a new device hosting the UPnP services is discovered. WARNING IMPORTANT Notice that this is an iPojo callback, and we should not block inside, so we process the request asynchronously.

unboundDevice

private void unboundDevice(org.osgi.service.upnp.UPnPDevice device)
Method invoked when a device is no longer available. We dispose all created discoveredDeviceProxies. WARNING IMPORTANT Notice that this is an iPojo callback, and we should not block inside, so we process the request asynchronously.
